"Astarte": "Object completed. Oh, I have information to read you regarding Matterboards."
"[The Matterboard is a guide, wherein new paths are unlocked whenever the currently displayed objectives are met.]"
"[These objectives come in various forms, such as defeating enemies, recovering items, and meeting specific people.]"
"[When an objective is met, the next path will be unlocked, advancing the story. You may proceed at your own pace.]"
"That is all. I shall now award your stamp."
